title: Bug 15098Cannot read workbench state if all perspectives closed
description: Bug 15098Cannot read workbench state if all perspectives closed
OB: If you close all of the perspectives in your workbench, exit and return you getan error that says "Cannot read workbench state".
SR: If you close all of the perspectives in your workbench, exit and return you getan error that says "Cannot read workbench state".
